7.2 The Transcendentals module

exp

G.f. method

Summary

Returns e, the base of natural logarithms, raised to the power indicated by its argument.

Signature

exp x => y

Arguments

x
An instance of type <real>.

Values

y
An instance of type <float>.

Library

common-extensions

Module

transcendentals

Description

Returns e, the base of natural logarithms, raised to the power x. The floating point precision is given by the precision of x.

See also

See the functions ^, page 168 and log, page 176.

Common Dylan and Functional Extensions - 31 Mar 00
